REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2242 reute d f BC-MUNSON-TRANSPORTATION 06-02 0061

TEXT.TITLE: MUNSON TRANSPORTATION DELAYS INITIAL OFFER
TEXT.BODY: Munson Transportation Inc said it postponed its proposed initial public offering due to weakness in the price of truck stocks. Munson is a trucking company that transports food products and other general commodities, primarily in the Midwestern, Central and Northeastern sections of the U.S. Reuter
